cause.description:
For almost 4 centuries this culture of the founding fathers has been the central and lasting component of American identity. Would America be the same today if in the seventeenth and eighteenth centuries it had been settled not by British but by French, Spanish or Portuguese Catholics? NO! It would be Quebec, Canada, Mexico, or Brazil. We must preserve the salience and substance of our national identity, that is being eroded by political and other forces...JOIN NOW!
1. Preserve the "American Creed".
2. Educate Americans of their Anglo-Protestant roots.
3. A bifurcated American society is not acceptable.
4. Responding to and engaging those groups which attempt to distort or destroy American culture
cause.mission: To spread out and strengthen American Anglo-Protestant culture.
cause.name: Save Anglo-Protestant Culture
